page.title: 05Llangeitho School.
page.content: There are 51 pupils at the school.Mr.Jones is headmaster, Mrs.Evans and Mrs.Llewelyn are his assistants. 20 pupils are from Welsh speaking homes and 31 are from English backgrounds.22 have both parents who can speak Welsh.25 pupils have fathers who can speak Welsh. 47 of the pupils are bilingual and the four others have recently arrived from England and are monoglot English speakers. 34 of the children were born locally and 17 were born in other areas. 8 of the pupils live in the village. The others arrive on the bus or by car. The official language of the school is Welsh and the teachers strive to maintain a Welsh atmosphere.
